title: Vegetarian mushroom stroganoff
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, sliced', '250g chestnut mushrooms, halved', '250g shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '2 red peppers, seeded and cut into fine strips', '200g broccoli, cut into small florets', '2 tablespoons brandy', '150ml vegetable stock', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '3 tablespoons horseradish (optional)', '150ml soured cream', 'salt and ground black pepper']
